document.full_text: in the wake of the financial crisis, regulators are strengthening their ability to spot fault lines in the financial system, rather than focusing exclusively on specific companies, federal reserve chairman ben bernanke said on thursday.
document.title: bernanke: regulators focused on system risks
lines_and_colors: in the wake of the financial crisis, regulators are strengthening their ability to spot fault lines in the financial system, rather than focusing exclusively on specific companies, federal reserve chairman ben bernanke said on thursday.
